subject: Ask-user multiline answers not supported
description: AskUserPanel tells users multi-line answers are allowed, but Input filters out newlines and Enter always submits, so multiline cannot be entered. Support Shift+Enter (or similar) to insert '\n' when askUserQuestion.multiline is true, or update UI copy to match behavior. Files: packages/terminal/src/components/AskUserPanel.tsx:43-46, Input.tsx:279-301.
